about_the_game:
Join heroes ranks in "Heroes of the Citadel." Create your team and decide the fate of Entaron. "Heroes of the Citadel" - become the light that pierces the darkness!

Traverse Entaron's captivating landscapes alongside Vastron, the paladin serving the Second King of Galo, and Merilda, the skilled archer with a noble bloodline. As challenges mount, you'll enlist the help of unique allies, from the draconids mage Signy to the fierce goblin warrior Lursha. With the weight of a world resting on your shoulders, strategy, choices, and teamwork become paramount. The fate of Entagon lies in your hands. Will you be its savior or its downfall?

In Heroes of the Citadel, it's not just about the might but the mind. Harness the unique talents of your assembled team in exhilarating battles. Choose your tactic and upgrade your skills to defeat enemies. Prepare your team for a hell of a fight. Equip and upgrade your favourite heroes and they resisted the forces of evil!

To arms, young warrior! The citadel's horn calls, beckoning brave souls to its mighty walls. As the night grows darker, your valor, wisdom, and alliances will be tested like never before. Ready yourself, rally your kin, and step forth into a saga that promises legend and honor. Entagon awaits its heroes. Will you answer the call?
